hadiths.text: Narrated A sister of Hudhayfah: The Prophet (ﷺ) as saying : You women folk, have in silver something with which you adorn yourselves. I assure you that any woman of you who adorns herself with gold which she displays will be punished for it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الذَّهَبِ لِلنِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Reported About Gold For Women
